description.value:
His true name is never written or spoken, for it is said it draws his attention, and he likes things to be interesting. He brings change gladly, wanted or not.

Edicts look for the longest traditions that they may be 'improved', teach others to not expect the same, it's alright to look boring once in a while

Anathema get stuck in a rut, even a fun one, forgo a chance to remind people if they do something just because it's how they always did it
